title: CDC approves new hepatitis B vaccine recommendation as some hospitals reject changes
description: Many states, hospitals, and doctors say they will continue to recommend hepatitis B shots at birth.
content: Many states, hospitals, and doctors say they will continue to recommend hepatitis B shots at birth.
